info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of recommended firmwares for the specified extension device type.
Access Group: any

schema.title: Extension Device Recommended Firmware Versions
schema.description: Retrieves a list of recommended firmware version of specified extension device for a specific FortiOS version.

fds_response.title: FortiGuard Distribution Server Response
fds_response.description: Human readable response based off the FortiGuard Distribution Server response code.

fds_response_code.title: FortiGuard Distribution Server Response Code
fds_response_code.description: FortiGuard Distribution Server response code when querying for firmware versions.

model_versions.title: Model Firmware Versions
model_versions.description: List of recommended firmware version information of specified extension device for the specified FortiOS version.

items.title: Model Firmware Version
items.description: Recommended firmware version for a specific extension device model for the specified FortiOS version.

model.title: Extension Device Model
model.description: The model of the extension device.

major.title: Major Version Number
major.description: The major version number of recommended firmware for this extension device model.

minor.title: Minor Version Number
minor.description: The minor version number of recommended firmware for this extension device model.

patch.title: Patch Version Number
patch.description: The patch version number of recommended firmware for this extension device model.

build.title: Build Version Number
build.description: The build version number of recommended firmware for this extension device model.

version_string.title: Version String
version_string.description: The full firmware version string including the model.

image_id.title: Extension Device Image ID
image_id.description: The extension device firmware image ID from FortiGuard Distribution Server.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Extension device type to get recommended firmwares for. [fortiswitch|fortiap|fortiextender]

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Target firmware version of the parent FortiGate.
